mapper.select: SELECT t1.material_info_id, t1.material_code, t2.order_code, t2.order_code_desc, t2.order_amount, t2.order_date, t2.order_unit FROM m_material_info AS t1 LEFT JOIN t_order_info AS t2 ON t2.order_code = t1.material_order_code AND t2.is_delete = 0 WHERE t1.is_delete = 0 AND t1.material_order_code = #{materialOrderCode} and t1.data_role_at =#{dataRoleAt}
